NWTF is re-listing Juanita's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.en:
Filiciana is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more stock to sell at her store.

NWTF is re-listing Filiciana's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more store stock to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Rosary

texts.en: Rosary is married with 2 dependents. She is 33 years old and lives in Carmen Annex, Osamiz City. Rosary owns and operates a motorcycle transport service business. She established the motorcycle transport business as a way of generating extra income and now makes PHP 8,000 per month. She has engaged in this type of service for 5 years. Rosary requested a loan of PHP 20,000 from GDMPC. She intends to use the money from the loan to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories. Rosary has been a member of GDMPC since 2010. In the future, Rosary wants to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina is a 38-year-old married mother of two children and lives in Capucao, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. For over five years, Felomina has made a living by running a general store that sells a variety of food and home-use products. She earns 5,000 PHP a month from her business.
In 2007, Felomina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 13,500 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy tools for repairing electrical items.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Toda persona tiene la oportunidad de reiniciarse, superarse y encontrar un camino que lo lleve al éxito, esta joven esta buscando la mejor opción que le permita encontrar un futuro mas próspero alejado de la delincuencia, vive junto a su familia que es su apoyo mas grande, a sus veinte años de edad ha comenzado un negocio que le ayuda con los gastos de su hogar, se dedica a la venta de tortillas pues es muy rentable y tiene experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los precios accesibles y por el servicio mas rápido; es una mujer dedicada a su labor, emprendedora y muy luchadora, día a día se esfuerza en el trabajo porque sabe que así obtendrá lo que tanto desea, esta muy contenta y tranquila con su negocio y en estas ultimas semanas que aumento la demanda, se decidió a realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su grupo familiar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Everybody has the chance to begin again, get ahead and find a road to success. This young woman is seeking the best option to allow her to find a more prosperous future away from crime. She lives with her family, who are her biggest support. At twenty years old, she has started a business to help with the household expenses. She sells tortillas, which is very profitable. She has experience, which allows her to obatin the most earnings. She has gained many customers who prefer her for her quality, accessible prices and quick service. She is dedicated to her work, and is enterprising and a fighter. She works hard day to day at her job because she knows that this way she will get what she wants the most. She is happy and at ease with her business and in these last few weeks demand has increased and she has decided to make an investment, but she doesn't have enough capital to back her up. That is why she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy corn wholesale and firewood. She has good credit references and is very responsible. She is committed to paying off the debt and is also confident that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale and firewood.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 45 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de su esposo Juvenal y sus 5 hijos. A los que cuida en la casa que compró hace 20 años. Gracias a la ayuda del estado peruano, aprendió todo lo necesario de la ganadería. En la actualidad es su principal actividad económica. Posee 5 vacas y 14 ovejas de las cuales cuida con mucho esmero y empeño, pues diariamente elabora queso, con la leche que producen. Según cuenta vende a buen precio y obtiene buenas ganancias con lo que solventa la economía de su hogar. Ahora desea seguir con el mejoramiento de sus animales, pues su secreto se centra en alimentarlos con pasto natural  y comida concentrada. Este es el crédito número 17 con MFP, en todo este tiempo demostró ser puntual y responsable sobre todo gusta de pertenecer a su asociación “virgen de Fátima”,  que lo conforman personas solidarias y con espíritu emprendedor. Carmen, invertirá el dinero en la compra de ovejas, para aumentar su ganado
texts.en: Carmen, 45, is a simple woman. She lives with her husband Juvenal and their 5 children, whom they care for in the house they bought 20 years ago. Thanks to help from the Peruvian state, she learned everything she needed about livestock. It’s currently her principal economic activity. She owns 5 cows and 14 sheep and takes care of them with great attention and determination. Every day she makes cheese from the milk they produce. According to her, she sells at a good price and makes enough income to support her household. Now she’d like to continue improving her care of the animals and with her secret, which is to feed them real grass and animal food. This is her 17th loan with MFP and in all of this time she has shown herself to be punctual and responsible. She enjoys being a member of the “Virgen de Fatima” (Virgin of Fatima) association, which comprises supportive people with entrepreneurial spirit. Carmen will invest her loan in buying sheep to increase her flock.

loans.use: buy sheep

loans.name: Cruz Del Norte Group

texts.es:
Paola Milagros tiene 25 años de edad, es soletra y tiene un hijo pequeño de 3 meses.  Paola Milagros es socia del grupo "Cruz del Norte", recientemente formado por 5 socios, todos con pequeños negocios pero con muchas ganas de crecer y llegar a ser grandes comerciantes.
Paola Milagros, se dedica a la venta de ropa, desde hace tres años. Ella ofrece sus prendas de vestir a sus familiares y amigos y ellos la recomiendan con otros clientes, paralelamente a éste negocio por el día vende menú en su domicilio. Le gustaría tener un pequeño bazar para lo cual trabaja mucho para juntar su capital y alquilar un stand ya sea en un mercado o alquilar un local en una zona comercial.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para iniciar su campaña navideña con anticipación.
Paola Milagros se encuentra al lado derecho de la fotografía, alzando su mano izquierda.
texts.en:
Paola Milagros, 26, is single and has a three-month-old child.  She's a member of Cruz del Norte Group, recently formed by five members, all with small businesses but with a great desire to grow and become great shopkeepers.

Paola Milagros has made a living selling clothing for three years.  She sells her clothing to family members and friends, and they recommend her to other customers.  In addition to this business she sells food in her home during the day.  She would like to have a little stall, for which she works a lot.

She's going to invest the loan in buying clothing to start the Christmas season early.

Paola Milagros is located at the right in the photograph, raising her left hand.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Sorena

texts.en:
This is Sorena. She previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to buy more quantities of products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments, and seasonings. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in her family's personal, household, and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 8,000 PHP loan to purchase raw ingredients and supplies needed in her business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her sustain her daily needs and pay for the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Sorena hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving her family a good future through all her hard work. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week. She also meets to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God her group studies.

 * All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw ingredients and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 52 years old and lives in Malintuboan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 5 children.
Elsie has a sari-sari store and sells fish and earns approximately PHP 4,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for additional capital. Elsie joined PMPC in 2012. In the future, Elsie hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries and fish to sell/retail.

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Priscilla now is 41 years of age. She used her previous loan to purchase food for the new cafeteria business, which has since been picking up well.

She has requested a second loan of KES 60,000 from KADET LTD, to buy a microwave oven and a refrigerator for use in her cafeteria business,

The profit she earns will help her pay school fees for her two children. She hopes to grow her business and open up a big hotel in Eldoret town in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a microwave oven and a refrigerator for use in her business.

loans.name: Tuoi

texts.en:
Tuoi is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increasing sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en: Huong is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as confectioneries, instant food and basic household items to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of products such as instant food, confectioneries and basic household items.

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh, a 42-year-old married woman, lives in Ho Chi Minh City with 2 children. Her husband supports his family by working as a silversmith. Anh runs a business that sells a variety of basic goods to people in the local community.

Anh requests a loan to purchase more products  to stock her store, such as many kinds of sauce, snack foods, washing powder, and shampoos. That will enable her to offer a better range of products to her customers. She hopes her business will run smoothly and she can earn additional income to re-invest in her shop and save for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase more products to stock her store, such as many kinds of sauce, snack foods, washing powder, and shampoos.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de esta mujer de treinta años de edad que vive junto a su grupo familiar es tener un nuevo inicio, con nuevos horizontes para dejar la vida pasada, alejada de fuerzas negativas, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente satisfecha con eso, ahora se dedica a la venta de recargas de las diferentes telefonías, chip, cargadores entre otros, comercia desde su local ubicado en una zona muy transitada de personas y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el excelente servicio, es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero, se siente muy feliz con el negocio, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar recargas, chip, cargadores, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica y una vida plena para su familia.
texts.en:
The desire of this thirty-year-old woman who lives together with her family is to have a new start, with new horizons in order to leave her past life, far from negative forces.  It is one of the best decisions she has made and she feels satisfied with it.  Now she earns a living selling phone cards for different companies, sim cards and chargers among other things.  She sells from her shop located in a very busy zone and she already has a lot of customers that prefer her for the product quality, the affordable prices, and above all the excellent service.  

She is an active, entrepreneurial woman who is dedicated to her work and she has a lot of goals she wishes to achieve.  She is working hard to obtain a more prosperous future.  She feels happy with the business.  

In the last few weeks the demand has increased so she wants to make a new investment.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy phone cards, sim cards, chargers, etc. She has good payment references and is very responsible.  She assures that she will be able to pay the debt and at the same time she is confident that she will bring economic security to her home and a full life to her family.

loans.use: to buy phone cards, sim cards and chargers

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Esta joven mujer esta empezando un negocio de venta de artículos para costurera, como tela, adornos, listones, flores, entre otros, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y dejar su vida pasada, que era rodeada de mucha violencia social, es una de las mejores y mas grandes decisiones que ha tomado y su grupo familiar esta dispuesto a darle su apoyo, comercia desde un local del mercado de la localidad donde vive, ha adquirido experiencia en las ventas y eso le permite obtener buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, los precios accesibles y el excelente servicio; es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, luchadora y con muchas metas que desea lograr, ha identificado que posee muchas habilidades importantes para sacar adelante éste reinicio, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas próspero, se siente muy contenta con el negocio, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela, adornos, listones, flores. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para todos.
texts.en:
This young woman is starting a business selling sewing materials, such as fabric, adornments, ribbon and flowers among other things.  She wants to have a new start and leave behind her past life which was surrounded by a lot of social violence.  It is one of the best and biggest decisions she has made and her family is ready to give her their support.  She sells from a shop in the market of the town where she lives.  She has acquired sales experience and that allows her to make a good profit.  She has gained a lot of customers because the people prefer her for the quality, affordable prices, and excellent service.  

She is an active, entrepreneurial and determined woman who is dedicated to her work and she has a lot of goals she wishes to accomplish.  She has identified that she possesses a lot of important skills to make this restart successful.  She is working hard to achieve a prosperous future.  She feels happy with the business. 

In the last few weeks, demand has increased so she wants to make a new investment.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy fabric, adornments, ribbon and flowers.  The young woman has good payment references and is responsible.  She promises to pay the debt and at the same time, she has the hope that she will bring economic security and a better quality of life for everyone in her home.

loans.use: to buy fabric, adornments, ribbon and flowers.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de salir adelante pese a vivir en medio de delincuencia y violencia social es lo que ánima a este joven que convive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, y se dedica a trabajar en su molino, procesando todo tipo de alimentos, como maiz, frijoles, hárinas, salsas, entre otros. Tiene ya algún tiempo con el negocio y posee amplia experiencia que le ayuda a generar muy buenas ganancias, es muy conocido por las personas de la localidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, por los precios accesibles y por el servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor y muy decidido a luchar por sus sueños, esta trabajando muy duro todos los días para no decepcionar a su familia, se siente satisfecho y muy cómodo con su negocio, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda por el servicio y sus dos molinos ya no le dan abasto por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar un molino nuevo de trabajo. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevará seguridad económica y emocional a su familia.
texts.en:
The desire to get ahead despite living in the middle of crime and social violence is what motives this young man who lives together with his family in their own home.  He earns a living working with his mill, processing all types of food, such as corn, beans, flour and sauces, among others.  He has had this business for some time now and he has ample experience, which helps him to earn good profits.  He is well known among the people in his town and he has gained a lot of customers who prefer him for the quality, affordable prices, and unrivaled service.  

He is an entrepreneurial man who is always at the service of his customers.  He is dedicated to his work and he is very determined to fight for his dreams.  He is working very hard every day in order to not let his family down.  He feels satisfied and very comfortable with his business. 

In the last few weeks, the demand for his service has increased and his two mills are not providing enough supply so he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow him to buy a new mill.  He has good payment references and is responsible.  He promises to repay the debt and at the same time, he has faith that he will bring economic and emotional security to his family.

loans.use: to buy a new working mill.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Querer ganarse un futuro mejor con su propio esfuerzo y vivir alejado de la delincuencia y pobreza es el principal propósito de éste hombre, habita junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia y se dedica a la venta de minutas en los diferentes alrededores de la localidad donde vive, tiene una valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le ayuda a generar muy buenas ganancias, es muy conocido por las personas de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, por los precios accesibles y por el servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor y muy decidido a luchar por sus sueños, esta trabajando duro todos los días para no decepcionar a su familia, se siente feliz y muy tranquilo con su negocio, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para invertir, pero no posee de suficiente capital que lo respalde por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hielo por mayor, frutas, saborizantes y además darle mantenimiento al carrito ambulante de venta. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Wanting to earn a better future with his own effort and living far from crime and poverty is the main purpose of this man.  He lives together with his family in their own home and he earns a living selling shaved ice snacks en different neighborhoods in the town where he lives.  He has valuable experience in sales, which helps him generate very good profits.  He is well known among the people in his town and he has gained a lot of customers who prefer him for the quality, affordable prices, and unrivaled service.  

He is an entrepreneurial man who is always at the service of his customers.  He is dedicated to his work and he is very determined to fight for his dreams.  He is working very hard every day in order to not let his family down.  He feels happy and very comfortable with his business. 

In the last few weeks, the demand has increased and he wants to take advantage to invest, but he does not have sufficient capital so he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow him to buy ice in bulk, fruit, and flavorings as well as to maintain the push cart from which he sells.  He has good payment references and is responsible.  He promises to repay the debt in the established period and, at the same time, he is hopeful that he will bring economic security to his home.

loans.use: to buy ice in bulk, fruits and flavorings and to maintain his push cart.

loans.name: Guillermina Celena

texts.es:
Guillermina, desea invertir más en su negocio, solicita un préstamo que le ayudara en la compra de lubricantes para vehículos, así mejorar su atención a los clientes fortaleciendo el inventario para tener mas disponibilidad acorde a las necesidades.
Ella manifiesta que gracias al préstamo anterior pudo crecer y tener todo lo necesario para atender de una mejor forma a los clientes, ella sigue con su negocio y en su familia la situación a mejorado, tienen una mejor vida que antes.
texts.en:
Guillermina would like to invest more in her business. She is requesting a loan to help her buy lubricants for vehicles. This way she can improve her customer service by stocking up on inventory in order to have more available according to her needs. 
She is thankful for the previous loan as it helped her grow her business and have everything she needed to attend to her clients better. She continues with her business. Her situation at home with her family has improved as they have a better life than before.

loans.use: buy lubricants.

loans.name: Ma'rifat

texts.ru: Маърифат жительница города Истаравшан. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. Сама Маърифат на протяжении одиннадцати лет занимается торговлей на рынке. Она в основном занимается оптовой продажей детской одежды. У Маърифат мужественный характер, она ответственный человек. Маърифат уже несколько лет как одна обеспечивает семью. Она берет кредит для покупки детской и подростковой зимней одежды, а также для приобретения вязанных жакетов и носков.
texts.en: Ma'rifat lives in Istaravshan. She is 46 years old, married, and has two children. Her husband is currently in the Russian Federation. For the last eleven years, Ma'rifat has been working in retail at the market. She mainly sells children's clothing. Ma'rifat has a strong character and is a responsible woman. For the past several years, she has been the sole provider for her family. Ma'rifat is seeking a loan to buy winter clothes for children and teenagers, as well as knitted jackets and socks.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes for children and teenagers, and knitted jackets and socks

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is married with six children. Virginia is 54 years old and lives in Talic, Oroquieta City.
Virginia buys and sells fruit to earn a living and has had this business for 2 years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to purchase a variety of fruits such as bananas, watermelons, etc. 
Virginia has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Virginia hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fruits such as bananas, watermelons, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of fish to re-sell.

loans.name: Linh

texts.en:
Linh, a 39-year-old mother of two, lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns a living working as a taxi driver. Linh supports her family by running a business selling votive products. She began ten years ago. 

Linh requires a loan to purchase larger quantities of votive products such as incense and many kinds of worship objects to sell. She hopes that her business runs smoothly and enables her to improve her family's income and living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase larger quantities of votive products such as incense to sell.

loans.name: Genaro

texts.en:
Genaro is 59 years old and lives in Matugas Bajo, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is widowed with 4 children. 
Genaro is engaged as a single motor for hire and earns approximately PHP 2,500 each month doing this type of work. He has a requested a loan to pay registration renewal fees and insurance on his motorcycle.
Genaro has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Genaro hopes to purchase another motorcycle.

loans.use: to pay registration renewal fees and insurance on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Vive en una localidad con alta violencia social y espera cambiar esta realidad para sus hijos en un futuro cercano, y así ellos no sufran la influencia de la delincuencia, por ello se levanta cada día para brindarle lo mejor de ella, es muy conocida en la zona de residencia por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad, es muy trabajadora y muy amable a la hora de vender es por eso que posee de clientes que la llegan a buscar y prefieren sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así lograr su sueño que es comprar mas productos como huevos, leche, harinas, arroz, frijol, crema entre otros. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada será dada y no tendrá mas preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en: This borrower lives in an area with high levels of social violence and she hopes to change this reality for her children in the near future, so that they don't suffer from the influence of crime.  To this end, she gets up everyday in order to offer them the best she has.  She is very well-known in her neighborhood for her humility and her dedication to her work.  She has never stopped striving and she has always overcome her difficulties.  With effort and dedication, she runs a store where she sells staple goods.  She is very hard-working and kind and that is why she has customers who frequent her store and prefer her products.  She has noticed the necessity of stocking more products in her store but she doesn't have the capital to do it.  For this reason, she approached INTEGRAL to request a loan and thus, reach her goal which is to purchase more products such as eggs, milk, flour, rice, beans, cream and others.  She trusts in God that soon the help she has requested will be given and that she will not have to worry so much about providing the daily needs of her household.

loans.use: to purchase more products like eggs, milk, flour, rice, beans, cream and others.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre hay momentos duros y difíciles pero el deseo de superación siempre se nos presenta en la vida. Esta cliente es un claro ejemplo de ello; vive junto a su compañero de vida y junto a él tienen el mejor deseo de salir adelante y nunca dejarse vencer por las adversidades de la vida, aún rodeados de una fuerte violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en la que viven. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y honesta con buenas relaciones en el lugar de residencia. Ella se dedica a vender perfumes en su hogar poco a poco se ha hecho de clientes que la prefieren y es por eso que desea comprar mas perfumes, tener variedad y no los mismo. Lamentablemente no tiene el capital suficiente para esta inversión, es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para la compra de esta materia prima y así darle variedad a sus clientes que tanto la prefieren. Agradece la ayuda que espera recibir y así estar segura que sus ventas crecerán un poco mas
texts.en: There are always difficult moments, but life always gives us opportunities for hope. This client is a clear example of this; she lives with her partner and together they have a strong desire to improve their lives. Although they are surrounded by a high level of violence in their neighborhood, they do not give up in the face of adversity. She is a hardworking and honest woman with good relationships with the people around her. She works selling perfumes out of her home and little by little she has developed a clientele. She wishes to buy more variety and not offer the same products as others. Unfortunately, she does not have the necessary capital for such an investment. This is why she came to INTEGRAL, so she could purchase these products and thus give her clients the variety they want. She is thankful for the support that she hopes to receive, and she is sure her sales will increase a little more.

loans.use: purchase perfumes

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una joven mujer de veinticinco años de edad que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, entre otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, la tienda es muy conocida  por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejada de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar  una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas, etc. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The desire to overcome and suceed is one of the dreams of this young 25-year old woman who lives with her family. She has a shop where they sell staple goods like basic grains, milk, and eggs. She has been running the business for a while and this experience has allowed her to improve her earnings. The shop is well-known in the neighborhood, and it has a clientele that likes the quality products, good prices, and excelent service. The owner is a hardworker and is dedicated to working every day to build a better future away from the violence of the neighborhood where she resides. She does her best every day because she is happy with her work, and she does not want to disappoint her family. In the last few weeks demand has been going up, and she needs to invest more. This is way she applied for a loan with INTEGRAL to buy basic grains, instant food products, snacks, bread, and drinks. This young woman has a good credit history and is very responsible. She is sure that she can pay off the debt and hopefully bring economic security to her small household.

loans.use: purchase basic grains, snacks, bread, drinks

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia en una zona de alta incidencia de violencia social y delincuencia, desea no verse afectada por ella, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, chocobananos, charamuscas congeladas de diferentes sabores, comercia desde su hogar y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio mas rápido, es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero. Se siente muy contenta con el negocio pero sabe que necesita hacerlo crecer a fin de salir de la pobreza, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda, por lo que quiere realizar una mayor inversión en la compra de los insumos necesarios para realizar sus productos, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, frutas, chocolate, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The desire to make something of herself is one of the most important dreams of a woman who lives in her own home with her family in an area with a high incidence of crime and social violence. She does not want to be affected by it, and her devotion to her profession has been one of the best decisions she has made.  She is proud of it. She sells tortillas, chocolate-covered bananas, and frozen popsicles of a variety of flavors.  She does business from home and already has many customers that prefer the quality of her products, her affordable prices, and most of all that she provides the fastest service.  She is an active, enterprising woman, who is dedicated to her work, and has many goals she wants to achieve.  She works very hard to achieve a more prosperous future. She is very happy with her business but knows she needs to make it grow so that she can emerge out of poverty.  In recent weeks the demand of her products has increased, so she wants to make a greater investment in the purchase of inputs needed to make her products.  For that reason she requests a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy wholesale corn, fruit, chocolate, etc.  She has good payment references and is very responsible.  She ensures that she will repay the debt and at the same time hopes to bring economic security to her household.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn, fruit, small bananas, and chocolate

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de esta mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y evitar así cualquier contacto con la violencia social que tiene invadido en lugar donde reside, además desea salir de la pobreza dando lo mejor de sus capacidades, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, se dedica a la venta de golosinas de forma ambulante y además vende comida por las tardes, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto,  por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero, se siente muy contenta con el negocio, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar golosina, carnes, granos básicos, verduras, bebidas a fin de hacer crecer su negocio. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The desire to do better is one of the most important dreams of this woman, who lives with her family in her own house. She wants to have a new beginning and avoid any of the social violence that has invaded her neighborhood. She also wants to leave poverty by using her capabilities. It is one of the best decisions she has made and she is proud of it.

She makes a living in selling candy as a street vendor and she also sells food in the evenings. She has many customers who choose her because of the quality of her products, the affordable prices and, especially, the excellent service. She is an active, enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and has many goals she wants to achieve. 

She is working hard for a more prosperous future and she is very happy. The demand has increased in the past weeks, so she wants to make a new investment. This is why she is asking INTEGRA for a loan that will allow her to buy candy, meat, grains, vegetables and beverages so she can grow her business.

She has good payment references and is very responsible. She ensures that she will be able to repay the loan and trusts that it will lead her household to economic security.

loans.use: to buy candy, meat, grains, vegetables and beverages.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru:
Мухаббат проживает в районе Яван. Ему 48 лет. Она разведена. У нее двое детей. Ее сын находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, дочь занимается шитьем национальных платьев дома. 
Мухаббат имеет высшее педагогическое образование. Она более 27 лет преподает в школе. Кроме того Мухаббат 20 лет как занимается торговлей. На сегодняшний день она открыла магазин со смешанным ассортиментом товара. 
Мухаббат берет кредит для покупки продуктов, а также для приобретения стеллажей, чтобы разложить приобретенный товар.
texts.en: Muhabbat lives in the Yavan region. She is 48 years old, divorced, and has 2 children. Her son is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation, and her daughter works at home sewing national dresses. Muhabbat is a qualified teacher and has been teaching in a school for more than 27 years. In addition, for the past 20 years, she has been working in retail. She is currently running a shop that she opened where she sells a mixed range of products. Muhabbat is seeking a loan to buy food items and shelving units to display these goods.

loans.use: To buy food items and shelving units

loans.name: Mai

texts.en:
Mai is 35 years old and is married with two sons. She has been running a business laminating papers and objects with plastic for two years. She started this business to cover her expenses and help raise her two children. Mai's husband works as a copper wire cutter. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Mai is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying different types of plastic. This will enable her to offer more products to her customers and increase the turnover of her business. 

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities and save money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy different types of plastic for her lamination service.

loans.name: Cau

texts.en:
Cau is a 41-year-old married man. He lives with a son and wife in Ho Chi Minh City. His wife earns money as a shop keeper. For six years, he has run a business of laminating papers and objects with plastic.

Cau would like a loan to purchase a greater quantity and variety of plastic to meet his customers' demands. 

He hopes that through his loan he will be able to increase his income and save money for any future difficulties facing his family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity and variety of plastics for his lamination service.

loans.name: Vohid

texts.ru:
Вохид 39 - летний женатый мужчина проживающий в районе Шахристон города Истаравшан. Он является отцом четверых детей. Жена Вохида домохозяйка, она занимается домашним хозяйством, также она занимается разведением скота. У Вохида образование среднее. Он работает на рынке района. Вохид арендует торговую точку, где занимается торговлей продуктов. В этой области Вохид десять лет. 
Вохид берет кредит для покупки конфет, шоколада и кондитерских изделий.
texts.en: Vohid is 39 years old and lives in the Shakhriston area of Istaravshan. He is married to a homemaker and they have 4 children. His wife takes care of their home and also raises cattle. Vohid has a high school education. He works at a local market where he rents a stall and sells food. He has been doing this type of work for the past 10 years. Vohid is seeking a loan in order to buy candies, chocolate, and confectionery items.

loans.use: To buy candies, chocolate, and confectionery items

loans.name: Claudia Mariela

texts.es: Claudia, casada, originaria de León, madre de tres hijos. Se dedica a atender un salón de belleza. Anteriormente se dedicaba a vender ropa ambulante pero uno de sus hijos salió muy enfermo y necesitaba pasar más tiempo en casa, ella estudio belleza así que decidió poner en práctica sus conocimientos y formo su pequeño salón de belleza el cual abre todos los días , su cliente más afluentes son las damas y los jóvenes. Está requiriendo el crédito para comprar tintes, cremas, shampo, peines, acondicionadores, navajas descartables. Su idea es modernizar más su salón, ofrecer calidad en los productos que usa, aprender nuevos estilos de corte para que su clientela se sienta a gusto en su salón. Otro proyecto que desea realizar es poner una pulperia.
texts.en:
Claudia is a married mother of three children, who is orginally from León. She runs a beauty salon. Previously, she was an ambulant clothing vendor, but her son got sick and she needed to spend more time at home. She studied cosmetology so she decided to put her studies in practice and started her small beauty salon. She opens it every day and her clientele includes mostly ladies and youngsters.  She’s requesting this loan to buy dyes, creams, shampoo, combs, conditioners and disposable razors.
Her idea is to modernize her salon, offer quality in the products she uses and learn new hair styles so her clients feel comfortable in her salon. Another project she’d like to realize is to open a grocery store.

loans.use: buy dyes, creams, shampoo, combs, conditioners and disposable razors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for sale.

loans.name: Dung

texts.en:
Dung, 39, is married and has a daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City, and her husband earns an income as a bricklayer. Dung started a tailoring shop 22 years ago. 

Dung is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of sewing materials and fabrics. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials and fabric to make clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock her business with a variety of products, like groceries and soft drinks.

loans.name: Truc

texts.en:
Truc is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increasing sales. She also hopes it will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to restock her general store.

loans.name: Cyrus

texts.en:
Cyrus is a single gentleman, 27 years old. He sells second-hand clothing and bags in Narok town. He has been running this business for five years and earns a monthly income of 25,000 KES.

He has borrowed a first loan of 50,000 KES from KADET LTD, which he intends to use to transport clothing and bags to his customers. The anticipated profit will be used to expand his stall. His dream is to improve his standard of living and own his residential plot.

loans.use: to pay for transportation of clothing and bags to customers

loans.name: Thang

texts.en: Thang is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of products, in particular food and beverages

loans.name: Evaline

texts.en: Evaline is a 30-year-old married woman. She has one child. She describes herself to be honest and intelligent. She operates a retail store where she sells clothes. Her business is located in a densely populated area, and her primary customers are local residents and people from nearby environs. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more clothes to sell. Her business goal is to run multiple boutiques within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will expand her business. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for sale.

loans.name: Zarifjon

texts.ru: Зарифчон проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ему 25 лет. Он холост. Зарифчон живет с матерью. Его мать пенсионерка. Зарифчон занимается животноводством. Он разводит мелко - рогатый скот у себя дома. Зарифчон в основном разводит овец. Он берет кредит для закупа коз и овец.
texts.en:
Zarifjon lives in the city of Istaravshan. He is 25 years old and single. Zarifjon lives with his mother. His mother is retired. 

Zarifjon works with livestock breeding. He breeds small, horned livestock at his home. Zarifjon mainly breeds sheep. He takes a loan for the purchase of goats and sheep.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and goats

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Thao

texts.en: Thao is a 26-year-old woman. She has 2 children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband have been running a business of servicing and selling electrical products for 6 years. Thao would like to receive a loan to buy a greater quantity and variety of DVD players, amplifiers, and accessories to sell from her store. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract additional customers. She also hopes that, through the loan, her business will generate higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity and variety of DVD players, amplifiers, and accessories to sell from her store.

loans.name: Linh

texts.en: Linh, 50, is married and has two sons. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn an income by running a general store in front of their house. They started this business 25 years ago. They sell milks, ingredients, confectionery products, and household items to people in their community. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products, especially foods and household items, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of products, especially foods and household items.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en: Norma is 65 years old, a widow and the mother of two children. She lives in Tabid, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental, where she has earned a living for the last 3 years by selling home and used products. She makes PHP 1,200 a month and is applying for a loan for PHP 3,500 to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee. She joined GDMPC in 2011 as a way to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en: Hoa would like to take a further loan to buy more soft drinks to sell from her stall. Hoa's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that, through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of soft drinks to sell from her stall

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a 53-year-old single mother of five children aged 30, 25, 22, 20 and 13 years respectively. She owns rental houses alongside a retail shop which she started three years ago and earns her a monthly income of 15,000 KES. 

She has requested a second loan of 50,000 KES to purchase two sacks of sugar, a sack of rice, two cartons of soap bars and tea leaves for sale. 

The profit she earns from it will help her expand her business. She hopes to succeed in these businesses.

loans.use: to purchase two sacks of sugar, a sack of rice, two cartons of soap bars and tea leaves

loans.name: Anjela

texts.en: Anjela is a 41-year-old married woman. She has four children. She describes herself to be honest and determined. She operates a beauty salon where she provides hairdressing services. Her business is located within a slum, and her primary customers are residents from the slum. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy beauty products to be used in the salon. Her business goal is to run multiple beauty salon outlets within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will meet all her family's financial needs with profits made from her salons. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy beauty products

loans.name: Angela Marilu

texts.es:
Angela Marilu tiene 29 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijas, vive con las hijas en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC. CAMINANDO HACIA EL FUTURO, SE ENCUENTYRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, PERTENECE AL CANTÓN VENTANAS SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRÍCOLAS.

Angela Marilu se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, fertilizantes, urea, líquido mata monte. Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

Con la ayuda del credito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras. El sueño es comprarce un solar. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son muchos cómo las plagas que destruyen los cultivos, el mal clima.

En el tiempo libre le gusta cuidar más en trabajo.

 " ESta muy agradecida por el crédito anterior que le ha servido de mucho para salir adelante".
texts.en:
Angela Marilu is 29 years old, single, and has two daughters. She lives with her daughters in the city of Ventanas, in Los Ríos province. She belongs to the communal bank Caminando hacia el Futuro, located in Jesus del Gran Poder, Ventanas Canton. Its members are farmers.

Angela Marilu works growing corn and rice. She is requesting this loan to purhase pesticides, fertilizers, urea, and liquid weed-killers. She will make her purchases in the city of Ventanas. 

This loan will allow her to buy what she needs to start the sowing and planting. Her dream is to purchase a piece of land. She faces many challenges, like pests that destroy the crops and bad weather. 

In her spare time she enjoys keeping to her work.

She is very grateful for her previous loan, because it helped her a lot in getting ahead.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides, fertilizers, urea, and liquid weed-killers.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a married woman. She has 8 children. She describes herself as an organized woman. She operates a dairy farm where she sells milk. She has been involved in this business for 12 years. Her business is located on favorable agricultural land and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of a ready market for selling milk. She will use the KES 15,000 loan to buy more sheep to sell. Her business goal is to double her income within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she can expand her business. In addition, Esther farms to increase her business income.

loans.use: to buy more sheep to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Gertrudes

texts.en:
Gertrudes is married with 8 children. Gertrudes is 61 years old and lives in Dansalan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.
Gertrudes is a farmer and owns rice fields to earn a living. She has been doing this for 37 years. She has requested a loan to purchase fertilizer for her farm business.
Gertrudes has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Gertrudes hopes to expand her rice fields.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her farm business.

loans.name: The

texts.en:
The is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock his general store. This purchase will help him to better meet the needs of his customers. His previous loan enabled him to improve his business and offer his customers a greater variety of products.

He hopes that his new loan will assist him in increasing the size of his store and increase sales, and will also help him to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more products to stock his store

loans.name: Thu

texts.en: Thu is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy more products for her shop.

loans.name: Nhanh

texts.en: Nhanh would like to take out a further loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of produce to sell from her stall. Nhanh's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers, and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Phung

texts.en: Phung would like to take a further loan to buy and repair second-hand cellphones to sell from her stall. Phung's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy and repair second-hand cellphones.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy grocery items for a grocery-selling business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients in baking breads

loans.name: Tuyet

texts.en:
Tuyet is 62 years old and is married. She has a daughter and lives with her in Ho Chi Minh City.

She has run a general store at her house for 12 years. She sells milk, beverages, stationery, confectionery and cellphones. She intends to use her loan to buy many kinds of products to sell, such as cellphones, eggs, sugar and sanitation items.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and save money for her family.

loans.use: To buy cellphones and household products to sell at her store.

loans.name: Chung

texts.en: Chung, 47, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns an income as a truck driver. Chung started a store in 1996. She sells shoes and clothes. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of clothes and shoes to sell at her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy shoes and clothes to sell at her store.

loans.name: Colombo

texts.es: El Sr. Colombo tiene 52 años de edad, es casado, vive con su esposa y sus cinco hijos en una aldea del municipio de Morazan, Yoro. Don Colombo ha sido agricultor toda su vida, siempre ha cultivado granos básicos y hace 4 años decidió cultivar una finca de café ya que la zona es apta para dicho cultivo. El vende el café en grano húmedo y en oro o seco en el mercado local. El préstamo que solicita es por 6,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en darle un buen mantenimiento a su finca,  va comprar fertilizantes para mejorar la calidad y producción. El tiene como meta ampliar el cultivo y hacer que su familia se supere.
texts.en: Colombo, 52, is married living with his wife and five children in a village in the municipality of Morazán, Yoro.  Colombo has been a farmer his entire life; he’s always grown basic grains and four years ago decided to grow coffee because the zone is apt for said crop.  He sells coffee in various processing styles in the local market.  He’s requesting a 6,000 Lempira loan to buy fertilizer to provide good crop care in order to improve quality and yields.  His goal is to expand the crop so his family can improve.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer for coffee crop maintenance.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is from Iraq. He is a youth client, 29 years old, married, with one child. He is the only provider for the family.
Hasan owns a small fast food cafeteria. He got into this profession by working as an employee in the fast food industry. He established his business in 2010 after having a good experience in the fast food business. He now has two employees and a good reputation in his local community.
He is requesting $3000 as Youth Loan to renovate his shop window and increase his inventory. He is aiming to cause his business to grow and to increase his profits so he will be able to provide better life conditions for his family

loans.use: to renovate his shop window and increase his inventory.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is married and has one child. She is 23 years old and resides at Capucao, Ozamis City. For the past 5 years, she has owned and operated a business venture planting and harvesting bananas and coconuts for sale. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000. Juliet has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. This year, she joined GDMPC. In the future, she hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher is a 32-year-old married man. He has one child. He describes himself to be honest and determined. He operates a restaurant where he sells food, tea, and snacks. His business is located within a slum, and his primary customers are residents from the slum. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. He will use the 20,000 KES loan to pay for the renovation of the business premises. His business goal is to diversify his business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will expand his business and meet his family's financial needs with the profits. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to pay for the renovation of the business premises

loans.name: Anibal Medardo

texts.es:
ANIBAL MEDARDO tiene 21 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC CAMINANDO HACIA EL FUTURO, SE ENCUENMTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, PERTENECE AL CANTÓN VENTANAS SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS.

 ANIBAL MEDARDO Se dedica a labores agrícolas, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos.
Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, insecticidas, ranger, abono organico. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes necesarios para la siembra y mejoraría el nivel económico.
 El sueño es comprarce tierras para agrandar las siembras. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es comprarce un carro.
En el tiempo libre le gusta conducir el auto del hermano.

"Esta muy agradecido por el crédito anterior".
texts.en:
Aníbal Medardo, 21, is single and has no children; he lives with his parents in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “Caminando Hacia el Futuro” (Heading for the Future) communal bank located in Recinto Jesús del Gran Poder belonging to Ventanas Canton; they work in agriculture.

Aníbal Medardo works in agriculture and also raises chickens and pigs.  He’s requesting a loan to buy urea, insecticide, Ranger [herbicide] and organic manure.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy the necessary fertilizers for the crop and will improve his economic standard.

His dream is to buy land to expand his crops and the challenge he faces is to buy a car.  He enjoys driving his brother’s car in his free time.  He’s very grateful for his previous loan.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Franklin Michael

texts.es:
FRANKLIN MICHAEL tiene 22 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene  una hija, vive con la esposa y con la hija en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC CAMINANDO HACIA EL FUTURO, SE ENCUENMTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, PERTENECE AL CANTÓN VENTANAS SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS.

FRANKLIN MICHAEL Se dedica a labores agrícolas, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos.
Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, balanceado, urea, insecticidas, ranger, abono organico. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejoraría el nivel de vida.  El sueño es comprar un terreno. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es el mal clima y las plagas.

En el tiempo libre le gusta cuidar más su trabajo.

"Esta muy agradecido por el crédito anterior".
texts.en:
Franklin Michael, 22, is in a relationship and has a daughter; he lives with his wife and daughter in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “Caminando Hacia el Futuro” (Heading for the Future) communal bank located in Recinto Jesús del Gran Poder belonging to Ventanas Canton; they work in agriculture.

Franklin Michael works in agriculture and also raises chickens and pigs.  He’s requesting a loan to buy urea, insecticide, Ranger [herbicide] and organic manure.  With help from the loan he will be able improve his economic standard.

His dream is to buy land.  The challenge he faces is crop infestations and bad weather.  He likes to spend his free time being watchful of his work.  He’s very grateful for his previous loan.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed, urea, insecticide, Ranger and organic manure.

loans.name: Houssam

texts.en: Houssam is from Iraq. He is a youth client, age 29 years old. He is married and lives with a family of three members, one of whom is employed. Houssam owns a shop for rosaries, small carpets and gifts. He has acquired this profession by working as a peddler. He established his business in 2006 after having a good year. He now has an employee and a good reputation in his local community. He is requesting $3,000 as a youth loan to renovate the shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his shop

loans.name: Amir

texts.en:
Amir is from Iraq. He is a youth client aged 25 years, single and lives with four family members, two of whom are employed.

Amir owns a car repair shop. He specializes in changing the cars’ oil. He established his business in 2010 and he has now an employee. He has good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting $1800 as a Youth loan to buy two machines specialized for his work. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two machines specialized for his work

loans.name: Rafed

texts.en:
Rafed, a youth client from Iraq, is 30 years old and married, but has no children yet. The sole provider for the family, Rafed owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents and snacks. Operating since 2011, he chose this field because he is well-versed in it. He now has ample experience and enjoys a good reputation in his local community.

Rafed is requesting a $1000 youth loan to buy a generator. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits in order to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a generator.

loans.name: Jihad

texts.en:
Jihad is a 29-year-old married father of two children. He has been working as a barber for the past 18 years. In 2005, he opened his own shop in Nabatieh to improve his standard of living and increase his income. Jihad is a hard worker. He seeks perfection in everything, especially in raising his children and providing them the best education.

Jihad is smart and talented. He was only 11 years old when he started working, to help his parents financially. Education is very important to him, especially since he wasn't able to finish his education. He only finished his elementary studies.

Jihad is applying for a youth loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to open a new branch in Tyre, which will increase his income and attract new customers from other nearby regions. This is Jihad's second loan from Al Majmoua; he has a good history of repaying loans. He works hard to expand his business and support his family.

loans.use: to open a new barber shop

loans.name: Al Sayyed Youssef

texts.en:
Al Sayyed Youssef is 25-year-old single man who has been working in car body repairs since 2007. He has good experience in his field, and develops his skills most of the time to please his customers as much as he can, in order to expand his business and increase his income.
Al Sayyed Youssef applied for a YOUTH LOAN from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua for the second time, in order to buy broken cars' hardware to use in fixing almost all of the cars that he works on, in a professional way. He loves to manage his own business and monitor how it's developing, and hopes to develop it more and more to cover almost all of his customers' needs. 
He wishes to open a big car services provider in the future which is a dream he hopes can come true.

loans.use: To buy broken cars' hardware for his car repairs business

loans.name: Abir

texts.en:
Abir is a 26-year-old married woman, the mother of three children. A year ago, Abir started selling Brazilian gold and accessories to help her husband in covering their family's expenses as much as they can. 

She works hard to provide the best living ever to her children, so that they don't feel that they need something that they can't afford. Abir's most important aim is to provide the best education ever to her children.

Abir applied for a YOUTH LOAN from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua for the first time, in order to increase her business capital to purchase a newly released jewelry collection. The sales will improve and develop her business a lot, which will reflect positively on both her social and financial situation.

She works from home to take good care of her children, and at the same improve their living. She hopes to expand her business one day to open her own shop.

loans.use: to increase her business capital to purchase and resell a newly released jewelry collection.

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
Abbass is a 30-year-old single man who is planning to get married soon. He has been working as a blacksmith since twelve years ago with a special talent. 

Abbass applied for a YOUTH LOAN from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, in order to buy a wash basin for his newly built house.

His business is improving a lot because of the good quality of products he produces and the special service he provides. Most of his customers are neighbors and friends who recommend him to others.

Abbass is planning to buy his own working place in the future, instead of the present rented one.

loans.use: to buy a wash basin for his new house.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 26-year-old married woman, the mother of one child. She has been working as a hairdresser for four years. She uses her house as her work place so she can manage her business and family responsibilities at the same time.

Amal is a hard worker who is working on improving and developing her business as much as she can. She applied for a youth loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to buy iron to do necessary maintenance on her house rooftop before the coming winter season to keep her house as a healthy living environment.

Amal helps her husband a lot in covering almost all of their expenses and is very proud of herself. She hopes to expand her business more in the future and open her own salon when her child becomes bigger.

loans.use: to buy iron to do necessary maintenance on her house rooftop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy medicines to sell.

loans.name: Lien

texts.en:
Lien is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.
She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of products to stock her general store.

loans.name: Lam

texts.en: Lam would like to take a further loan to buy good quality ingredients and spices to make food to sell from his stall. His previous loan enabled him to increase his sales and earn more income to support his family. He hopes that another loan will help him increase the size of his business, attract new customers, and increase sales. He also hopes that he can increase his income and improve his family's living conditions through the loan.

loans.use: to buy good quality ingredients and spices to make food to sell from his stall.

loans.name: Luan

texts.en: Luan is requesting a new loan to buy fruit and soft drinks. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will help her increase the size of her business, attract new customers, and increase her sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fruit and soft drinks.

loans.name: Huy

texts.en:
Huy, 58, is married and has four children: two sons and two daughters. He lives with his family in Ho Chi Minh City. He and his wife earn an income making and selling worship item products. 

He started this business ten years ago. He is requesting a loan to expand his business by buying a greater quantity of materials to increase his production and better satisfy his customers.

He hopes his business runs smoothly and will generate higher income to assist him in improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials to make worship item products.

loans.name: Uranchimeg

texts.en: Uranchimeg, who is 20 years old, lives with her brothers in a Ger in Govi-Altai province. She is a hardworking woman. Her older brothers help with her business and her younger brothers are in secondary school. In 2010, Uranchimeg started her coal and firewood retail business. It is a seasonal business, so she decided to start a permanent business of construction block-stone manufacturing with her two brothers. Her brothers have experience manufacturing block-stone because they have been working at a manufacturing company. Uranchimeg needs 1,000,000 MNT to purchase inventory and tools to start her block-stone manufacturing business.

loans.use: To purchase inventory and tools to start her block-stone manufacturing business

loans.name: Letutui

texts.en:
Letutui is 46 years old and blessed with five children. He works in a slaughterhouse in Narok and has been running the business for the past five years, making a monthly income of 25,000 KES.

He has borrowed his first loan of 30,000 KES from KADET Ltd., with which he intends to purchase more livestock for slaughter to sell to his customers. The anticipated profit will be reinvested to boost his business. His dream for the future is to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to purchase livestock for slaughter

loans.name: Mumbua

texts.en:
Mumbua is a 30-year-old married woman. She has three children. She describes herself as an intelligent and self-motivated woman. 

Mumbua operates a retail store where she sells charcoal. Her business is located within a slum area and her primary customers are residents from the slum. She describes her biggest business challenge as lack of funds for improving the business. 

She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more charcoal for selling. Her business goal is to be a supplier of charcoal within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to sell

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is a 49 year old married woman who has three children. She describes herself to be honest and driven. Susan operates a tailoring retail store where she sells clothes. Her business is located in a slum area and her primary customers are residents of the slum. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds for improving her business. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy a sewing machine. Her business goal is to run multiple tailoring retail stores within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her tailoring business

loans.name: Bernice

texts.en:
Bernice is a 40-year-old married woman. She has three children. She describes herself as honest. 

Bernice operates a beauty salon where she provides hair services and sells beauty products. Her business is located within a slum area and her primary customers are residents from the slum. She describes her biggest business challenge as inadequate funds for improving the business. 

Bernice will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy cosmetics for her salon. Her business goal is to run multiple beauty salons within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for her salon

loans.name: Sara Elizabeth

texts.es:
SARA ELIZABETH tiene 39 años de edad es soltera tiene tiene tres hijos, vive con los hijos en la ciudad de Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC CAMINANDO HACIA EL FUTURO, SE ENCUENMTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, PERTENECE AL CANTÓN VENTANAS SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS.

 SARA ELIZABETH Se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, insecticidas, ranger, abono organico. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insecticidas necesarios para la siembra y mejoraría el nivel económico de los hijos.

 El sueño es comprarce dos terrenos . Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la falta de dinerio para adquirir los productos agrícolas.
En el tiempo libre le gusta cuidar el trabajo. "Está muy agradecido por el anterior crédito".
texts.en:
Sara Elizabeth, 39, is single and has three children; she lives with her children in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.  She’s a member of the “Caminando Hacia el Futuro” (Heading for the Future) communal bank located in Recinto Jesús del Gran Poder belonging to Ventanas Canton; they work in agriculture.

Sara Elizabeth works in agriculture growing corn.  She’s requesting a loan to buy urea, insecticide, Ranger [herbicide] and organic manure.  With help from the loan she will be able improve buy the insecticide needed for her crops and improve her children’s economic standard.

Her dream is to buy land.  The challenge she faces is lack of money to buy farm supplies.  She likes to spend her free time watching over her work.  She’s very grateful for her previous loan.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Hoang

texts.en:
Hoang is 49 years old and is married. He has three children and lives with them and his wife in Ho Chi Minh City. His wife earns an income as a tailor. Hoang has run a welding shop at his house for 38 years. He intends to use a loan to buy equipment and materials in order to increase his production capacity and to be able to better meet his customers' demands. 

He hopes his business runs smoothly and will help him to improve his family's living conditions and save money for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy equipment and materials.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 44 years old, married to Stephen, and has been blessed with six children that she supports. She operates a small food cafe and has been in the business for the last 10 years, earning a monthly income of KES 25,000. 


She is borrowing her first loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD that she plans to use to expand and renovate her premises.

She intends to plough her anticipated profits back into the business and pay school fees for her children. Her future dreams is to prosper and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to renovate and expand her small food cafe.

loans.name: Jobelle

texts.en:
This is Jobelle, 24, a resident of Silang, Philippines. She is married to Raymond, her business partner, and is a mother to her children.
